dialog: Gaze upon the heels of thy footwear, for they appear to be slanting.
Fear not, for I possess the skill to repair them with precision.
Pray tell, what shall be the cost of the mending?
Six coins of yuan shall be the price, and I shall restore thy heels to their former glory.
I must say, the price seems quite steep. I would offer four yuan instead, or I may seek assistance elsewhere.
Very well, I shall attend to the mending of thy heels.
May I inquire, how long shall the task take? Might I sit and wait as thou repairst them?
Indeed, the task shall be completed in but a few moments.
Fantastic! I shall take my seat here and wait with anticipation.
Greetings!
Greetings, is this Stefan whom I address?
Alas, thou hast dialed the incorrect number. There is no one by the name of Stefan here.
Surely, thou jest. I called previously and spoke with Stefan himself.
I assure thee, thou hast the wrong number. This number hath been mine for over two decades.
This cannot be so. I recall the number distinctly. Is it not 1199886?
Nay, the number is incorrect. It is 1199866. Thou hast dialed an incorrect number.
My apologies for the inconvenience. I am truly sorry for bothering thee.
Fear not, such mistakes are common amongst us all.
My sincerest apologies once again.
Think nothing of it.
